title: Hello
body:
{$player}: Hello, {$self}. 
<<if not met($player)>> 
    <<setmet($player)>>
    {$self}: Hello.  
    [[Need something?.|WhatNeed]]
<<else>> 
    {$self}: Hello, {$player}.
    [[how are you?|HowThings]]
<<end>>

title: WhatNeed
body:
{$player}: Could you help me?.
|{$self}: Yes.
    [[Actions]]
|{$self}: No.
    [[CouldHelpNo]]

title: HowThings
body:
{$player}: How your things?  
|{$self}: Good.  
|{$self}: Not bad.  
|{$self}: Bad.  
{$self}: Yours?
[[PlayerThings]]

title: PlayerThings
body:
-> Good
    {$self}: Good!
-> Okay
    {$self}: Ok
    [[So|Actions]]
-> Bad
    {$self}: Why?
    [[Ask]]
